name: June Inside Demo
description:
June Inside Demo is a top-down action adventure game happening on an alien planet.

The climate on your planet is changing, you're sent to find a new source of energy to save your world.  But things are starting to get complicated when you're eaten alive by a Giant Worm. You're still alive, but you need to get out of here. Unknown to you, this world as a whole is a big living organism.

Soon you'll realise things that are beyond just your surivival...

This is a demo and a beginning to an adventure that will shape your peoples future and perspectives on the crisis.

You can leave your feedback here more anonymously (sorry it's in polish but you can use googles english translation) or simply leave a comment:

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1kXO0TlfDpKgDTiRmYK4aZUBlk1B3Hy2KhkkkmKgOm_E/edi...
